comments.body: @rohanjr We need to fix this import in the same way as the other imports yesterday. Will this be fixed by the PR to avoid duplicating files?

This is in the "after" section, so it's not in the template and files will still be duplicated for now. But I did go through and update the parts that are actually included in the guide (which this part isn't). It's fiddly and error-prone now I know.
